William Tonji N'Gounou (amụrụ ya na 31 Julaị 1983) bụ onye Nijeria lara ezumike nká na bọọlụ nke na-agba bọọlụ dị ka onye na-agba n'ihu
N'Gounou gbara bọọlụ na Kadji Sports Academy, AS FAN, FC Rosengård, IF Limhamn Bunkeflo na KSF Prespa Birlik.
O gbara egwuregwu ya nke mbụ ya na mba Niger n'afọ 2011, wee pụta maka ha na egwuregwu FIFA World Cup.
A họpụtara ya maka 2012 Africa Cup of Nations, na-agba goolu mbụ nke Niger na ruo ugbu a, naanị, goolu na akụkọ ihe mere eme nke asọmpi megide Tunisia na 1 - 2.
